articles.title: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Realty Income Story For Investors
articles.mainIdea: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Realty Income Story For Investors
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Realty Income Story For Investors. Realty Income's narrative has shifted subtly but meaningfully, with its fair value estimate edging down to about $63.35 even as revenue growth expectations improve to roughly 5.12%. Behind these tweaks, analysts are balancing healthier net lease assumptions and resilient Q3 fundamentals against slightly higher required returns. The discount rate has nudged up to around 8.11% amid a cautious macro backdrop. Stay tuned to see how you can track these evolving targets and keep up with the story... Related tickers mentioned: O.
